title: Pokemon GO Shinies Data
description: Schema for Pokemon GO shiny availability data from LeekDuck

name.description: English name of the Pokemon (includes regional prefix if applicable)

releasedDate.description: Date when the shiny was first released (YYYY/MM/DD or YYYY/M/D format), or null if not yet released

typeCode.description: Regional variant or form code (e.g., _61 = Alolan, _31 = Galarian, _51 = Hisuian, _52 = Paldean, costume codes like _11, _14, etc.)

forms.description: Array of alternative forms/costumes for this Pokemon

name.description: Form identifier (e.g., f19 for Fall 2019, 11 for costume variant)

imageUrl.description: URL to the form's shiny sprite image
URL to the base shiny sprite image (optional, not present for Pokemon with only forms)

width.description: Image width in pixels (optional, not present for Pokemon with only forms)

height.description: Image height in pixels (optional, not present for Pokemon with only forms)
